title: UI Lead
responsibilities: Led front-end development team, architecting UI/UX designs and coding responsive interfaces using React and React Flow.
Collaborated with designers and backend developers to deliver mobile-first web applications, optimizing performance by 15%.
Conducted code reviews, mentored junior developers, and managed project timelines to ensure on-time delivery.
Utilized Figma, GitHub, and Visual Studio Code for design-to-code workflows and team collaboration.

title: Front End Developer Intern
responsibilities: Developed and maintained web application front-ends using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, ensuring pixel-perfect designs.
Translated UI/UX designs into functional, responsive interfaces, integrating RESTful APIs for dynamic functionality.
Implemented version control using Git, streamlining development workflows and reducing merge conflicts.
